title: COOFANDY Mens Cuban Guayabera Shirt Short Sleeve Button Down Shirts Summer Beach Vacation Shirts
description: PREMIUM FABRIC - Mens Short Sleeve Cuban Shirt is made of premium fabric that is lightweight, durable, breathable, soft and skin-friendly, keeping you cool and relaxed in summer

CUBAN GUAYABERA STYLE - Mens guayabera shirts features spread collar, short sleeves, button closure, cutout vertical pleats. Considerate details of design makes this shirt more fashionable and classic

COLLOCATION - The mens casual shirt is the perfect versatile item that can be easily worn with shorts, jeans, slacks, or trousers for a personalized look. This summer shirt is an staple for your wardrobe

OCCASIONS - The mens short sleeve button down shirt is a great option for beach, vacation, hawaiian, party, wedding, yoga, work, cruise, home or other casual daily wear. Perfect gift for family, friends or yourself
WARM TIPS - US size. Machine wash. Please refer to our size chart to ensure you select the suitable size. If you have any questions about our summer shirts, don't hesitate to contact us
